subject: fix: improve scroll performance and remove sensitive logging
body:
Performance improvements:
- Fix auto-scroll behavior during pagination by tracking user scroll state
- Increase polling interval from 3s to 5s to reduce server load
- Add error handling for scroll operations with fallback to scrollToOffset
- Prevent auto-scroll during user manual scrolling

Security improvements:
- Remove sensitive data from logs (message content, user IDs, chat codes, player IDs)
- Sanitize console logs to only show message/chat IDs and boolean flags
- Keep error logging for debugging while protecting user privacy

Changes made:
- hooks/useMessages.ts: Sanitized message logging, increased poll interval to 5s
- services/messages.ts: Removed message content and user IDs from logs
- services/reactions.ts: Sanitized reaction logging
- app/(app)/chat/[id].tsx: Improved scroll behavior with user interaction tracking
- app/(app)/join.tsx: Removed chat code from logs
- services/chat.ts: Removed chat code from logs
- services/appInstance.ts: Removed player ID from logs
- services/onesignal.ts: Sanitized permission logs
- hooks/useNotifications.ts: Replaced player ID with boolean flag
title: improve scroll performance and remove sensitive logging
